name: Dangerous Tails
description:
From the minds of Casual Chumps comes Dangerous Tails!
Run your way through three unique levels, keeping one of two playable characters fed by collecting food, and staying alive by avoiding obstacles!

Development Team

Jessica Caplova- Producer and Programmer 

Mark Castillo- 3D Artist

Kellen Cosgrove- Artist 

Nick Miceli- Programmer 

Alana Brunson- UI/Concept Artist
